title: (17857) Sant Joan les Fonts - 20 Carrer Sant Pere
title_short: (17857) Sant Joan les Fonts - 20 Carrer Sant Pere
description:
Parking for the exclusive use of motorhomes with a parking limit of 48 hours. Parking is allowed but no camping. The use or deployment of camp items and furnishings is not permitted. In the area where the car park is located, it is forbidden to make fires.
The container opening service varies according to the established schedule (the containers work with a special card): Monday to Friday from 08:00 to 10:00 and Friday at 20:00 to Monday at 08:00.
The place is quiet, next to a residential area and a beautiful river. We saw lots of birds. the kids loved it here with cute little coves in which their lego boats floated!
Not much to do but lovely walks in the area.

title: (17857) Sant Joan les Fonts - 5 Carrer de la Rompuda
title_short: (17857) Sant Joan les Fonts - 5 Carrer de la Rompuda
description: Drinking water opposite the playground and 50 m from the motorhome area

title: (17858) Girona - 6P Sc la Bobila
description: A place parallel to the road with a lot of grass and a table to eat and next to the table we have a fountain where we can replenish water. the place is next to a transport logistics company. with small noises nothing annoying and with the passage of some car or another on the main road but you are away from the road. ideal to spend a night fill water and continue travel. children and the dog will enjoy a lot.

title: (17178) Les Preses - 38 Carrer la Fageda
description: Ideal to spend the day

description: Shared parking with cars. Location for visiting Margarita volcano, daytime only, toilets, water fountain.

title: (17811) Santa Pau -
description: We found this place fleeing from the paying car parks of the volcanoes. It is a good alternative, walking 10 minutes from Santa Margarida. You can park but staying overnight, camping, or fires is not allowed. We spoke with the woman from the farmhouse and she said no problem.

title: (17174) Sant Feliu de Pallerols - Cami de Sant Iscle
title_short: (17174) Sant Feliu de Pallerols - Cami de Sant Iscle
description: Quiet, flat & shady spot in the middle of the forest. Perfect for vans or even bigger vehicles.

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 32 Avinguda dels Volcans
description:
Municipal AC area, prior reservation via web (free) with picnic areas and a food truck at the entrance.
Just entering from the tourist information office.
Be careful because there is a previous parking area where you are not allowed to spend the night, you have to go to the end.
Reservation on the website.

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 32 Avinguda dels Volcans
description:
Free parking all year, planned for 25 motorhomes in the middle of nature. It is located 5 minutes from the medieval town of Santa Pau, very beautiful and with many walks nearby.

The only place authorized to spend the night in the entire municipality of Santa Pau: at the end of the dirt parking lot. If you spend the night in another place you can be fined.

The overnight stay is free but it is necessary to book through the tourism website (Visit Santa Pau) by filling out a form.

The bathrooms are open at the same times as the tourist office.
The garbage cans are at the entrance and are only open from 8 to 10 am.

title: (17176) Vall den Bas - 53 Diseminado Despoblado
description: Good motorhome area. Free parking and paid services.  Card payment. Free emptying of gray and black water. It is next to the road but little traffic at night. Thanks to the hostel for the initiative!!

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 4 Plaça de les Fonts

description: Handy tap with Gardena coupling for a garden hose.

title_short: (17176) Sant Esteve d'en Bas - 29 Avinguda Fernando Laparte
description: Parking on the coast of the soccer camp and in an area of joc per nens. At the coast of the via verda

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 16 Carrer del Pont
description: Public toilets, very clean. I'm not sure of the opening hours, but it opens at 7am. Overnight stay is not allowed, only parking.

title: (17811) Santa Pau -
description: Fenced land with security cameras, in the town of Santa Pau (Girona), of 400m2, next to the Volcà Simó. Easy to settle in, animals are allowed, it has a sunrise and sunset with incredible views and views of the horses that we have on our farm. Access by car and camper is allowed, we are 15 minutes from the town on foot and you can walk the route of the volcanoes from our location. Ideal for cycling and hiking routes. Horseback riding, motorcycles, etc... Ideal for families and total disconnection in nature. The gastronomy and the beauty of the town is fascinating. Contact for reservation: tel.

title: (17813) - N-260
description: Open space next to the little crowded road, ideal for eating, resting or spending the night

title: (17813) Sant Pere Despuig - N-260
description: Parking next to the road with some shade, ideal for a siesta or spending the night.

title: (17176) Juanetas - 162 Carretera Joanetes
description: By parking next to a restaurant, quiet to spend the night, there is no electricity, but it is a good place, surrounded by nature

title: (17176) -
description: Road that goes to the Can Turó restaurant. No services but quite flat. Space for a large ac or two small ones. The place to turn are problems. Very calm. You have to leave the road that goes up to the parking lot above Salt Sallent and turn left. About 400m. Hidden and we have spent the night calm. There is no sign of prohibition and the restaurant workers passed by and said nothing to us. It does not bother the circulation. Good place for hiking.

name: Càmping Mas Patxet

No services. 5/6 seats quite level. The rest with chocks.

title: (17830) Mieres - GI-524

title: (17867) Camprodon - 30 Diseminado Afuera Camprodo
description: Access by dirt track a few kilometers. Natural place. Take care of nature. Ideal for hiking trails.

name: Camping Vidrà
title: (17515) Camping Vidrà
description: Excellent family campsite for a weekend. Everything is very clean. Large pitches, we have a motorhome over 7 meters and all is well. The restaurant's food is homemade. Good price. Weekend 32 euros. They accept animals. The owner's name is Bea, very kind and sympathetic. Ideal for excursions around to enjoy the view.

title: (17853) Sales de Llierca - GIV-5236
description: Bellavista Climbing Carpark. There are three good sized lay-bys here used for the climbing area Bellavista. The road leading up is all tarmac but is quite narrow and bumpy so drive carefully. The crag gets used frequently by local climbers so park respectfully. Access possible for most sized vehicles ours is LWB Crafter but wouldn’t want to be much bigger.

title: (08569) Pruit - C-153
description: The passage from the asphalt to the road has too much unevenness for a motorhome. Only accessible for 4x4 or slightly elevated vehicles. The flattest place is at the end of the road, which is the access to a field. Shady and very quiet. Suitable for one night.

title: (17867) Beget - 186 Diseminado Afuera Camprodo
description: Parking at the entrance of the town, on the road that arrives from Camprodon. There is a sign that prohibits camping, it has never been in a tent or in a caravan.

title: (17866) Camprodon - 21 C-38
description: An area at the entrance to the campsite Vall de Camprodon open 24h / 24h

name: Camping Vall de Camprodon
title: (17866) Camping Vall de Camprodon
description: Camprodon, 21 C-38. Camping Vall de Camprodon, located 2 km from the center of Camprodon bike along a quiet road. East of the River Ter, well located to discover the valley, plus an area at the entrance open 24 hours

title: (17831) Sant Miquel de Campmajor - GIV-5246
description: Church parking very quiet. Very calm. Next door there are two iron swings for children.

title: (17166) Susqueda -
description: Parking for 5 or 6 vehicles, at the foot of the road, with views towards Susqueda. Very quiet and secluded.

name: Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
title: (17831) Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
description: Small and family campsite. It has a small farm with rabbits and chickens and a playground for the little ones. Very quiet place and in a good area to visit both Banyoles and Fageda d'en Jordà.

name: Camping de Besalú
title: (17850) Camping de Besalú
description: Campsite a bit old but quite clean. The gentleman at the reception very friendly. In low season without a pool but affordable price. Half an hour walk from the town. Better by bike. Good option after reading the comments about robberies in town parking lots. They do not have to empty gray water.

title: (17860) Colonia Llaudet - 17 N-260
description: Parking near Sant Joan de les abadesses, very quiet and clean, please keep it, we spent the night very quiet and alone

title: (17867) Camprodon - Unnamed Road

title: (17850) Besalú - 31 Passeig Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer

name: Rupit

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - Unnamed Road

Quiet place on land, 1 km from the town of Camprodon. Good access.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Rupit
title: (08569) Área de Autocaravanas Rupit
description: Rupit municipal car park. Medieval Catalonia. Picnic area, WC at Mateix Costa del Poble. Opportunities for hiking and mountain biking. Water point and electricity. Maximum stay 48 hours.

title: (17868) Molló - GIV-5223
description: Parking located at Coll de la Buixeda, on the road that goes to Rocabruna and Beget, a town that seems to be sorted by a nativity scene. Attention: narrow road to arrive at Beget. Spectacular views over l'Alta Garrotxa and the castle of Rocabruna, indret molt tranquil.

title: (17867) Font-Rubí -
description: Site by the side of the road for 3 vans, surrounded by trees, shaded. Vehicles pass during the day.

title: (17850) Besalú - Camí del Rec
description: Merendero by the river with magnificent views of the medieval village. We spent the night with another van without problem. Super quiet place, only the ducklings and the frogs that live there are heard. Nearby, inside the village, there is a public bath.

title: (17850) Besalú - 6 Carrer de Sous
description: Any of the streets of this residential district of Besalú is quiet and you can park easily. Very well connected with the town.

title: (17866) Camprodon - 136 Diseminado Afuera Camprodo
description: Water at Repssol station

title: (17850) Besalú - 36 Carrer Comte Tallaferro
description: Parking for van and small car

title: (17850) Besalú - C-66
description: Practical parking for visiting the surroundings but a lot of traffic, no shade, close proximity. A cafe and free toilets can be found at the end of the parking lot. Attention closed at night. The medieval city of Besalu is very nice. We stayed here for 2 night in November. Not far from the Garrotxa volcanoes

title: (17867) Camprodon - 5 Carretera St Juan Antigua
description: Parking at the entrance to Parc Mare de la Font. Great place for a rest stop or to visit the city and the park.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 3 Carrer del Costabona
description: Car park in the center of Camprodon, it is the second car park on the right just entering the town. Unpaved area with space for large vehicles. passing a small bridge you access the other car park where only small vehicles fit.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 5 Carretera St Juan Antigua
description: Large esplanade of land where you can park, there is space for many vehicles and close to the town center. relatively level

title: (17867) Camprodon - 23 Carretera de Sant Joan
description: You can park and sleep without problems, very close to the town. It is not paved, they also park cars. The space is very large.

title: (17861) Sant Martí d'Ogassa - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to sleep and observe nature and the stars

title: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious place, where to spend the night without problems. Lots of shade and easy access.

title: (17850) Besalú - 4 Carretera de Girona
description: Quiet location and clean pitches. A few meters from the beautiful village of Besalu with a small train that will transport you to town in 50 minutes. To recommend

title: (17867) Camprodon - C 38
description: Day parking

title: (08584) Santa Maria de Besora -
description: Sólo acceso en 4x4: lugar tranquilo y amplio con vistas a la montaña. Llega señal de móvil y no pasa mucha gente (únicamente algún ciclista)

title: (17867) Camprodon - 3 Carretera de Molló
description: Space right on the side of the road in the iron source. quiet place next to the river, although there are already houses on the other side of it. fishing area with lures

name: Fangaventura
title: (17831) Fangaventura
description: Closed. It is not possible to stay the night.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - s/n Parc de l'Estació
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - s/n Parc de l'Estació
description: very quiet car park

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 25 Carretera d'Ogassa
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 25 Carretera d'Ogassa
description: Quiet parking, a bit out of town, but ideal for visiting the malatosca gorg. We spent a quiet night together with other motorhomes. Local police passed through the area several times. They greeted and no problem.

title: (17166) El Far - 73 Barri el Far
description: Parking at the foot of the lighthouse sanctuary, spectacular views, barbecue area, bar and children's playground. We do not know if you can sleep, being a holiday we have stopped in the BUS zone to take some photos from the viewpoint.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 1 Passeig de l'Estació
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 1 Passeig de l'Estació
description: Nice quiet and safe place where you can park overnight while visiting Sant Joan.

title: (17867) Camprodon - GIV-5264
description: Parking where you can stay overnight, no service, quiet, 5 mins walk from the center of Camprodon, there is a fountain for water. Small vehicles only

name: Camping Els Solans
title: (17867) Camping Els Solans
description: Camping Els Solans. Camping very quiet and family atmosphere on the banks of the river Ritort, has a playground, cafeteria with wifi where you can order press, bread and pastries brought from Camprodon, is a place surrounded by nature perfect for hiking and looking for mushrooms, Owners make you feel very comfortable from the first moment.

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Great place in the forest with some views of mountains. secluded. 1 group of Enduros, nobody else seen. The gravel road goes with VW T3 and Renault Kangoo. Not for mobile homes or large vans.

title: (17850) Sant Ferriol - Camí de Juïnyà
description: Near some farms and by the side of a quiet road, with many trees and plenty of shade. Only some areas are flat, probably enough for 4 vans. The rest can be adjusted using leveling. Not really suitable for big campervan because of limited space of manoeuvre and low trees. There's also a  flat concrete slab that can be used for cooking of whatever else. Quite some hungry mosquitoes at sunset.

title: (08511) L'Esquirol -
description: Flat for 2 campers, quiet, perfect to spend the day and night quietly.

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Good place for two vans. It has shade to eat. Access by dirt road through the Badua water reservoir.

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Grand espace plat en pleine nature qui dépanne bien si le précédent est occupé. C'est une espèce de gravière. C'est calme

title: (17867) Camprodon - 12 Passeig de Maristany
description: Ideal place to stop for lunch. Little traffic and lots of shade. Located on Paseo Maristany, 10 minutes from the center of Camprodon.

title: (08572) La Riera - Unnamed road
description: Shaded parking near a stream. Quiet place

title: (17171) Susqueda - 16 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: We stayed the night and everything was very quiet, but we did not lift the roof because we were next to a bar and very close to houses.

title: (17850) Sant Ferriol - C-66
description: Along a dirt road. several locations near the river No services just calm.

title: (17850) Beuda - GIV-5234
description: Level ground parking. Very nice views Without services

title: (17734) Lliurona -
description: Perfect esplanade to stop to eat or spend the night. only 4x4

title: (08511) Santa Maria de Corcó - 23 Passeig les Gorgues
title_short: (08511) Santa Maria de Corcó - 23 Passeig les Gorgues
description: Aparcament davant del cementiri, des d'on començar a path of hiking. Molt tranquil i nivellat.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 35 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Paratge
description: Forest parking with sculptures...quiet place always open and very nice to sleep...don't forget to visit the forest full of sculptures.

title: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - BV-5224
description: Nice picnic area by a river

title: (08584) Santa Maria de Besora -
description: There is a a parking option by the road side before salt de mir. there is a possibility to go on top of the hill or on the bottom. and you can oversee the mountains and get a view for a sunset. but it cane be difficult to park as the ground is bumpy

title: (17850) Bauda - GIV-5234
description: Spectacular area, surrounded by nature, with picnic tables, culumpios, soccer goals and baskets, water fountain and a large covered area (if it rains, great).

title: (17861) Ogassa - Unnamed Road
description: Access via a narrow road that only crosses a vehicle in one direction. The place is a small esplanade. Area where the wind is strong.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat
description: Ample parking next to the river. Next to the Bar de La Calavera, open on Saturdays from 1 pm. Excellent beers.

title: (17869) Llanars - Carrer G
description: Superb view, quiet place for one night. Only accessible to 4x4 vans

title: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - 1 Carrer Font de Riu d'Aura
title_short: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - 1 Carrer Font de Riu d'Aura
description: Beautiful green area on the edge of the town, very quiet and with a large area to play, there is a skatepark, a trial bike circuit, a soccer field and a playground. There is a large tree with much shade and space for several vehicles, less than 5 minutes away there is a small river ideal for soaking with children, and several hiking trails.

title: (17510) Ripoll - Unnamed Road
description: Small flat area ideal for a quiet night's sleep and visit the "Bufadors of Bevi" area. The path of the excursion begins about 2 km from the place of the night, but it is recommended to spend the night here, to be a flat area and having a picnic table.

title: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Pla de Sous, space at the coast of the road, in the middle of nature, planer and tranquil. Perfect for campers.

address.street: Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17869) Llanars - 138 Diseminado Despoblado
description: Shaded area a few minutes from Llanars. You have the river next to it and little influx of cars

title: (08569) L'Esquirol - BV- 5207
description: A place to stop on the road between El Esquirol and Tavertet. Very quiet

title: (08584) Santa Maria de Besora - 1 Camí dels Ferrers
title_short: (08584) Santa Maria de Besora - 1 Camí dels Ferrers
description: Parking next to the Sports Center, a very quiet and fairly level place. To visit the town is ideal. From here also begins a hiking route to visit the Salt del Mir, about 9km round trip.

title: (17733) Bassegoda - Unnamed Road
description: Flat grass area off of the fire road. 4x4 only due to the steep hills and hairpins. Quite, idilic sheltered fairly flat open area.

title: (08569) Rupit i Pruit - Unnamed Road
description: Location in the heart of nature not far from the Sallian jump, the monastery of Sant Joan de fabreges and the village of Rupit. Very quiet and clean so be sure to leave it in good condition.

title: (17199) Biert - Unnamed Road
description: Level esplanade on the mountain. you can stay overnight without problem. views from the viewpoint near the monastery, bouldering areas, routes and mountain biking. There is no service whatsoever and it is a secluded area with no one to bother you.

title: (17868) Molló - Passeig del Vallespir
description: Parking for camper, quiet.

title: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Parking land and gravel, fairly flat, sanctuary with bar, restaurant, wc ... service 50m. Excellent views of the Girona region, it is generally common to find views full of clouds and even to be in the middle of the clouds.

address.street: Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17834) Pujarnol - 11 Carretera Pujarnol
description: Pujarnol tower. An ancient fortress dating back to the year 1200 from which you can see the sea, it currently houses a rural community immersed in the forest where 9 adults and 5 children live between the heart of Pla de l'Estany and the region of La Garrotxa. Particular place with a bell tower that was an old Torrevigía. We love having visitors! For this we have the following options: - Area for vans/motorhomes... - Camping area - Hostel (10 places) - During your stay whatever your option To sleep, you can enjoy a covered outdoor kitchen with fridge, barbecue, covered multipurpose room (former barn), solar showers, conventional shower, dry toilets distributed in different spaces, conventional and square bathroom. If you feel like it, you can join our community vegetarian/vegan lunches (at 1:00 p.m.) with products from our vegetable garden, chicken coop and Km0 cooperatives. You do NOT need to let us know if you would like to stay overnight in a van as we have plenty of space to accommodate you.

title: (17861) Sant Martí de Surroca -
description: Attention, accessible via a 300m track, in good condition and completely accessible by car and van. We just went in a van, but I strongly advise against motorhomes with too low ground clearance! Otherwise it is possible to climb to have a 360° view after 4km of hiking. The view is superb. The temperature can drop out of season and the wind blows quite often.

title: (17861) Sant Martí d'Ogassa - 1 Barri del Taller
title_short: (17861) Sant Martí d'Ogassa - 1 Barri del Taller
description:
Fairly new RV park in the town of Ogassa.
In wild nature.

title: (17199) Biert - Unnamed Road
description: Place on the side of a little traveled road. Cyclists and hikers pass early but it is a very quiet area with good views.

title: (17734) Albanyà - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Albanyà - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Small flat space for a van, maybe for two, with some beautiful monastery ruins to visit. The road is frequented by cyclists

address.street: Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (66230) Lamanère - 9 Serrat d'El Souill
description: Very nice quiet location with several options. Small path on the right just past the village. Enjoy!

title: (17510) Llaés -
description: Parking where some excursions depart from. About 3 or 4 vans fit. Although it is next to the race, it is a super quiet road. No services.

title: (17861) Ogassa - 3P Passeig St Amand
description: Located in the veïnat of Prat del Pinter and it is not forbidden to spend the night at the moment. Space for 3 large motorhomes. Several vans fit on the streets below. Last 100m of steep slope but well paved. A mini-excursion can be to go down to Ogassa for breakfast, there are two signposted routes. So that they also did not prohibit this area above, let's be clean and that there are no signs of our passage when we leave (papers or similar) You can not spend the night. All over town there are no motorhome signs.

title: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - 4 Carrer 8 de Març
title_short: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - 4 Carrer 8 de Març
description: Relatively quiet flat terrain

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Carrer Camí del Canal
title_short: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Carrer Camí del Canal
description: Small picturesque village. Parking for motorhomes.

name: Camping Can Coromines
title: (17851) Camping Can Coromines
description: Can Coromines, small family run camping with lots of trees, grass and plenty of nature

title: (17170) Amer - 140 Carrer Santa Brígida
description: Parking available next to river bank by the municipal sports center (football etc.)  quiet and space for several motorhomes.  adjacent to town.

title: (17868) Molló - 13 Veïnat del Riberal
description: Ideal parking to visit the Molló Park, it can not be visited by motorhomes because no convenience inside. Near the road, so it's not a good place to spend the night.

title: (17869) Llanars -
description: Esplanade next to the road, little traveled at night. We slept one night and everything is fine. Without services, between Vilallonga de Ter and Llanars.

title: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
title_short: (17170) Amer - 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras
description: Perfect place to sleep and do green via carrilet bike, we were 2 nights advised by the firemen next door, there are tables and barbecue, no toilets or other services but in the village of Amer we find everything, ideal for lovers of the bike and walks

address.street: 1 Carrer Josep M. Folch i Torras

title: (17166) Susqueda - 21 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: Wonderful place to sleep and spend the day with spectacular views of the distance and the susqueda dam. There are two picnic tables covered by a small roof. 360° view of the mountain range, easily accessible by van.

title: (17868) Molló - 40 C-38
description: Parking located at the top of Coll d'Ares, without services but with outstanding views both on the north and south slopes, there are picnic tables and an area with grass, it is also the starting point of some seed beds, interesting the Camí de la retreat and especially the one that goes to the Torre del Mir, a medieval building with spectacular views over the Tec and Canigó valley.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 10 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Mieres
description: Just to make a stopover.

title: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet location on the river, near the city
